Encounter.Name: Contact The Draugar
Encounter.DescriptionText: You hail the Draugar captain. After a few short moments a crackling voice comes over the subspace communicator:

Message.Text: Hello SING, So you are here to pay your protection money. How disappointing. It will Cost you MONEY credits this time, Ularmr

Response.Text: Change your mind and tell them to bug off.

Message.Text: Thank you, now i must buy lunch. Later!
are you trying seducing us with that smell of yours? So tasty...
How fun! You don't have the money. On with the merryment, then.
